Module kivakit.core

Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging

package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.telenav.kivakit.core
     
    com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.loggers
     
    com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs
     
  • Class
    Description
    Log
    Accepts log entries for some purpose, such as writing them to a file or displaying them in a terminal window.
    LogEntry
    A log entry object containing a message and meta-information about the origin of the message and its nature.
    Logger
    A Logger accepts Messages via Logger.log(Message) and writes them to one or more Logs.
    LoggerCodeContext
    Information about the origin of a LogEntry, including the host and class.
    LoggerFactory
    Creates new Logger instances via LoggerFactory.newLogger().
